name: Workmate
description: Workmate is here to rebuild business confidence in their frontline workforce by connecting them to a qualified temporary workforce. Through our data-driven tools and automation, Workmate make staffing and workforce management easier for businesses to engage and depend on their shift-based workforce. As Workmate transform the way businesses work with their shift-based workforce, Workmate also help workers gain fairer access to jobs, job satisfaction, and financial opportunities to increase their quality of life.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Transforming the future of frontline staffing
ShortDescription: Workmate is Southeast Asia's first "Workforce-as-a-service" for the Frontline Workforce .

Highlights.name: Outsourced Staffing for Long-Term Support
Highlights.description: Workmate is more than a service; we're your staffing ally. We step in as the legal employer, handling all the formalities and paperwork. This means we take care of employment contracts, responsibilities, and payroll, all while ensuring everything is up to code with government standards. You can then focus on what you do best—running your business.

Highlights.name: Temporary Staffing for Short-Term Jobs
Highlights.description: Workmate's Casual Staffing connects you with a network of workers ready for short-term or seasonal work. Our platform makes it a breeze to fill positions fast, scale up for busy seasons, or manage one-off projects. It's staffing made simple, flexible, and tailored to your immediate needs.

Highlights.name: Effortless Management, Insightful Outcomes
Highlights.description: Our user-friendly dashboard gives you a clear view of your staffing situation in a snap. Track job fulfillment, manage schedules, and get insights—all with fewer clicks and less paperwork.

Highlights.name: Smart Staffing Within Your Budget
Highlights.description: Your finances matter. Our tech-driven approach cuts out unnecessary admin, saving you time and money. With Workmate, expect up to 30% savings compared to traditional staffing—without compromising on quality.

enhanced_description: Workmate is a 'Workforce-as-a-service' platform, specifically designed for the frontline and shift-based workforce, primarily serving Southeast Asia. It aims to rebuild business confidence by connecting businesses with a qualified temporary workforce through data-driven tools and automation. Workmate simplifies staffing and workforce management by acting as a staffing ally, handling long-term outsourced staffing as the legal employer (including employment contracts, payroll, and government compliance), and providing temporary staffing for short-term or seasonal needs. The platform offers a user-friendly dashboard for effortless management, allowing businesses to track job fulfillment and manage schedules while aiming to optimize standard operating procedures and provide on-site management and oversight. Workmate differentiates itself by claiming to offer up to 30% savings compared to traditional staffing methods.
